title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 2.1 - Advertisement of interest rate achieved through compounding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 2.1 - Advertisement of interest rate achieved through compounding

State Regulations

Advertisements may refer to an effective annual yield on
any savings account, time deposit, certificate of deposit, or other time
balance, which is achieved by compounding interest during one year together
with a reference to the basis of compounding, but the annual rate of simple
interest on such time balance which does not include the effect of compounding
shall also be stated with at least equal prominence. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
